FuncDef: This command configures a source IP address range prefix to be used as a management access filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP prefix for the IP match criterion in dotted decimal notation.
Specifies the subnet mask length expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 32 (mask length), 0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255 (dotted decimal).
Specifies the dotted quad equivalent of the mask length. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255.

ExtraInfo: Default: No source IP match criterion is specified.
